note.name: Someone's note?
note.msg: I took that old pair of dowsing rods from the attic to the park, to see if there was any truth to the rumor they could find treasure. They work! I had to be pointing straight at it, but my dowsing rod discovered a tunnel I hadn't seen before that seems to lead into a mysterious place. The entrance is where the vibration is at its maximum. Staggering!

str.name: Vibration
str.tooltip: Activates when you're pointed at something reactive.
